title: If you know how I feel: Scott's old new friend
creator_credit: Linda Haskins and Centron Educational Films
brief_description: Tells the story of 10-year-old Scott who befriends an old woman in a park. The value of their friendship is revealed as Scott obtains books for the woman and she helps him to improve his reading. A sympathetic portrayal of old age that will help in breaking down stereotypes and promoting discussion about values and self-determination. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
